video.title: A Gifted Man
video.synopsis: This metaphysical drama begins with a surgeon having a chance encounter with his ex-wife ... and then learning she died two weeks earlier.

episodes.synopsis: After the ghost of his ex-wife asks him to run her low income clinic, Michael finds himself rushing between his patients and her less fortunate ones.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Michael faces a dilemma when he treats a pregnant personal friend with a brain tumor and a little boy at the clinic with sickle cell.
episodes.title: In Case Of All Hell Breaking Loose

episodes.synopsis: Michael must perform emergency surgery on a patient without knowing the exact diagnosis while also looking for a new clinic director.
episodes.title: In Case Of Discomfort

episodes.synopsis: When Michael treats a patient who is hearing voices, he turns to Anton for help. Meanwhile, Kate's first day at the clinic doesn't go well.
episodes.title: In Case Of Separation Anxiety

episodes.synopsis: Michael courts Evan "E-Mo" Morris, a neuropsychiatrist to join his practice after E-Mo determines a patient's diagnosis by reading her body language.
episodes.title: In Case Of Loss Of Control

episodes.synopsis: While at the clinic, Michael runs into a former football star who was a patient years prior and is now living on the streets.
episodes.title: In Case Of Memory Loss

episodes.synopsis: When Michael finds out a patient with a malignant brain tumor committed a horrible crime, he struggles with whether to save the man's life.
episodes.title: In Case Of Exposure

episodes.synopsis: Rita's surprise thanksgiving reunion with her son is cut short when he has a motorcycle accident and it's up to Michael to save him.
episodes.title: In Case Of Missed Communication

episodes.synopsis: While treating a tense woman for headaches on the eve of her wedding, Michael notices her mother is suffering from something much more serious.
episodes.title: In Case Of Abnormal Rhythm

episodes.synopsis: When Michael shows signs of a serious condition, his colleagues at the clinic must operate on him immediately during a blizzard.
episodes.title: In Case Of A Bolt From The Blue

episodes.synopsis: Michael and E-Mo disagree on how to treat a patient with a brain tumor. A teenager girl gives birth at the clinic and runs out, leaving the baby.
episodes.title: In Case Of (Re)Birth

episodes.synopsis: Michael saves a man from drowning and learns his identity is a mystery. Kate discovers a girl she mentors has serious issues.
episodes.title: In Case Of Blind Spots

episodes.synopsis: A distraught woman takes the clinic hostage after Michael testifies for a patient who he believed suffered uncontrollable urges due to a brain tumor.
episodes.title: In Case Of Complications

episodes.synopsis: A spoiled pop star at Holt Neuro and a young girl at the clinic exhibits similar symptoms, forcing both teams of doctors to find the common link.
episodes.title: In Case Of Co-Dependents

episodes.synopsis: When Michael's high school sweetheart comes to Holt Neuro with an irreversible condition, he will stop at nothing to try and save her.
episodes.title: In Case Of Letting Go

episodes.synopsis: Michael learns that a patient at the clinic has a special connection to Anna and he reunites with an old friend who is suffering from a rare illness.
episodes.title: In Case Of Heart Failure
